overview:
Brian Adamsky is the chief administrative officer and managing director for Cross Atlantic. Brian oversees all accounting/financial due diligence, fund administration and limited partner reporting. He is a CPA with more than 25 years of financial and administrative experience in various senior level positions. Prior to Cross Atlantic, he was the CFO for Megasystems, Inc., a Safeguard Scientifics partnership company.

Prior to Megasystems, he was general manager of Maritank, Inc., a multi-site petroleum storage and distribution company, where he was responsible for all operations, administrative, finance, and accounting functions.
Brian holds a B.S. degree from LaSalle University ‘s School of Business .

relationships.title: chief administrative officer and managing director
